hero.title: Creating modern web solutions for business
hero.subtitle: Development of interfaces in React/Next.js with responsive layout for mobile devices. Structured component organization with reusability and clear naming. Animation and section adjustments according to the provided design.

about.label: About me
about.title: Front-end development focused on intuitive interfaces and business goals. Websites and landing pages on React/Next.js with a well-thought-out structure, adaptability, and micro-animations that support the brand and do not overload the user.

craft.title: I am a frontend developer.
craft.description: I create web interfaces that combine aesthetics and functionality. I work with landing pages and small websites on React/Next.js, build component architecture, and think through adaptability, animations, and performance. It is important to me that the design is not only beautiful, but also understandable and convenient for people.
focusAreas: Development of landing pages and small websites on React/Next.js
Responsive layout, accessibility, and basic SEO optimization
Component structure with clear naming and reusability
Animations and micro-interactions that emphasize the brand rather than distract

descriptions.css3: Modern styling with layouts, animations and responsive design.

descriptions.javascript: Programming language that powers interactions in the browser.
descriptions.react: Component-based library for building interactive interfaces.
descriptions.bootstrap: UI framework with ready-made components for quick prototyping.
descriptions.nextjs: Full-stack React framework for fast, SEO-friendly applications.
descriptions.mui: React UI library with accessible and customizable components.

descriptions.tailwindcss: Utility-first CSS that keeps styles consistent and maintainable.

stepsList.title: Analysis and strategy
stepsList.description: We start with a briefing: we agree on the goals, structure and visual style of the website and form a preliminary estimate of the budget and deadlines.

stepsList.title: Agreement on terms and conditions
stepsList.description: If necessary, we conclude a contract in which we clearly specify the scope of work, deadlines, cost and rules of cooperation.

stepsList.title: Project launch
stepsList.description: After confirming the terms, you make a 30% prepayment, I reserve the time and proceed with the project implementation.

stepsList.title: Website development
stepsList.description: I create and program websites, integrate your content, and check that everything works correctly on different devices and browsers.

stepsList.title: Launch and transfer
stepsList.description: I make final edits, publish the website, and provide access details and brief instructions on how to use it.

stepsList.title: Support and development
stepsList.description: Upon request, I provide further support: updates, minor changes, and optimisation for stable and efficient website operation.

itemsList.title: Landing page
itemsList.description: Single-page website built around one clear offer and a strong call-to-action to drive sign-ups or sales.

itemsList.title: Business card website
itemsList.description: Compact multi-page website that highlights your brand, services, portfolio and contact details.

itemsList.title: Corporate website
itemsList.description: Full-scale company website with service pages, team, case studies, blog and lead-generation forms.

itemsList.title: Website redesign
itemsList.description: Refreshing the look and structure of your current website with modern UI, responsive layout and improved usability.

itemsList.title: Online store
itemsList.description: E-commerce website with product catalog, cart, checkout flow and payment integrations.

itemsList.title: Catalog / content website
itemsList.description: Structured website with categories, filters and content: service catalog, article hub or portfolio collection.

itemsList.title: Mini web app
itemsList.description: Development of a small web app: price calculator, booking form, plan selector or interactive widget.

itemsList.title: Blog / news module
itemsList.description: Implementing a blog or news section on your existing website with organized posts and categories.

itemsList.title: Localization & multi-language
itemsList.description: Adding new languages, setting up locale switching and ensuring content displays correctly for different markets.

itemsList.title: UI components & design system
itemsList.description: Building a reusable UI component library based on your design: buttons, forms, modals and more.

itemsList.title: Email templates
itemsList.description: Responsive HTML email templates for newsletters, promos and automated campaigns, tested in major email clients.

itemsList.title: Analytics integration
itemsList.description: Integrating Google Analytics, Meta Pixel and key events to track leads, clicks and purchases.

itemsList.title: Technical SEO (basic)
itemsList.description: Configuring metadata, clean URLs, sitemap, robots.txt and core technical settings to improve indexability.

itemsList.title: Performance optimization
itemsList.description: Making your website load faster through image, code and caching optimization using modern performance best practices.

itemsList.title: UX review
itemsList.description: Review of user flows, navigation and conversion paths with specific suggestions to improve usability and results.

itemsList.title: Website audit
itemsList.description: Detailed review of performance, structure and layout with a clear checklist of improvement actions.

itemsList.title: Website maintenance
itemsList.description: Ongoing content updates, small fixes, monitoring and technical support for your website.

itemsList.title: Bug fixing
itemsList.description: Finding and fixing layout and frontend logic issues, responsive bugs, form problems and interactive glitches.

itemsList.title: Consultation
itemsList.description: One-on-one sessions on website structure, tech stack choices, UX decisions and basic SEO strategy.

proposal.label: Proposal
proposal.title: Let’s build your website together.
proposal.description: A successful website starts with clear goals and transparent collaboration. Together, we’ll turn your ideas into a modern web experience — fast, user-friendly, and aligned with your business needs.

faqs.title: FAQs
faqs.subtitle: The most common questions about my work, approach, and how the process is organised.

itemsList.question: What technologies do you use for frontend development?
itemsList.answer: I specialize in frontend development using React and Next.js for building modern, fast, and responsive web interfaces. I also work with HTML5, CSS3 (Tailwind CSS, MUI), and JavaScript to ensure high-quality layouts and functionality.

itemsList.question: How do you ensure the website is responsive on different devices?
itemsList.answer: I use modern layout techniques like Flexbox, CSS Grid, and media queries to create responsive designs. This ensures your website will look great on all devices, from mobile phones to desktops.

itemsList.question: Do you provide support after the website is launched?
itemsList.answer: Yes, I offer post-launch support, including content updates, bug fixes, and performance optimization to ensure your site runs smoothly after deployment.

itemsList.question: How long does it take to build a website?
itemsList.answer: The development time depends on the complexity of the project. Typically, a landing page takes 2–4 weeks, and a small business website can take 3–5 weeks. Exact timelines will be determined after discussing your requirements and goals.

itemsList.question: What do you need to start working on my project?
itemsList.answer: To start, I need a brief with your goals, required features, design (if available), and any content you want to include on the site. The more information you provide, the better I can understand your needs.

itemsList.question: Can I make changes to the website after it's launched?
itemsList.answer: Yes, after launch, you will be able to update the content on your own. If you need help with technical aspects or adding new features, I am always available for support.

itemsList.question: What payment methods do you accept?
itemsList.answer: I accept payments via bank transfer, PayPal, or other popular payment systems. Payment details will be discussed when we finalize the terms of the collaboration.

itemsList.question: Do you work with international clients?
itemsList.answer: Yes, I work with clients from all around the world. We can communicate in both English and Ukrainian, and I’m happy to adjust to your time zone for meetings and project updates.

itemsList.question: What is the process of working with you?
itemsList.answer: The process starts with discussing your goals and requirements. Then we agree on terms, sign a contract (if needed), and start development. I keep you updated on progress and involve you in key decisions.

itemsList.question: Can I see your previous work?
itemsList.answer: Yes, you can view my portfolio on this site, which showcases some of my previous projects. If you have specific requests or would like to discuss your project, feel free to reach out.

itemsList.question: Can you help with SEO optimization for my website?
itemsList.answer: Yes, I can assist with basic technical SEO optimization, including metadata setup, SEO-friendly URLs, sitemaps, robots.txt, and proper heading structure. This will help improve your site's indexing in search engines.

itemsList.question: What factors affect the price of a project?
itemsList.answer: The price depends on several factors: the number of pages, design complexity, features (forms, filters, integrations, animations), existing content, and deadlines. After the brief, I provide one or two budget options: a basic solution and an expanded version with additional features. Payment is staged: an upfront deposit, and the final payment after project completion.

faqs.subtitle2: If you didn’t find your answer here, reach out and I’ll be happy to help with your specific request.
